official_title: Impacts of Diet, Activity, and Mood on a Dynamic Gut Microbiota During Treatment for Triple-negative Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of early-stage triple-negative breast cancer, not on neoadjuvant systemic therapy at the time of enrollment.
* Age greater than or equal to 18 years and less than 100 years
* English proficiency at or above 8th grade level
* Expected survival greater than or equal to 12 months
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Prebiotic and/or probiotic use prior to and during the study
